backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining catalog, user profiles, orders, carts, KYC data, and admin-export logic with storage and authorization mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to modified files, components used, related tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of various frontend files including components, pages, and layouts for reference.
frontend/.env.production: Production environment file setting VITE_APP_ENV to Live.
frontend/docs/deployment-preflight.md: Documentation describing Version‑29‑only preflight checks validating environment, dependencies, backend build, and frontend build requirements.
frontend/docs/draft-rebuild-v29.md: Guide for rebuilding Draft Version 29 safely without deploying or modifying backend state.
frontend/docs/live-smoke-test-v22.md: Manual verification checklist for validating Live deployment integrity for Version 22.
frontend/docs/live-smoke-test-v29-report: Template for recording results of a Version 29 Live smoke test including catalog, purchase flow, and admin checks.
frontend/docs/live-smoke-test-v29.md: Manual smoke test checklist for Draft 29 covering environment badge, wallet address, catalog, book details, and other core UI verification.
frontend/docs/publish-live.md: Instructions for publishing frontend Version 29 to Live with strict version enforcement and safety rules.
frontend/index.css: TailwindCSS configuration defining theme variables, light/dark modes, and base styling rules.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML shell loading the frontend root element and main TypeScript entry script.
frontend/scripts/deployment-preflight.sh: Preflight script validating Version 29, environment config, dependencies, and build success without deploying.
frontend/scripts/enforce-version-29.sh: Guard script ensuring the frontend VERSION file contains exactly '29' before builds or deployment.
frontend/scripts/live-smoke-test-v22-hel: Helper script printing Version 22 smoke test checklist and key verification URLs.
frontend/scripts/live-smoke-test-v29-hel: Helper script printing Draft 29 smoke test checklist, key URLs, and manual verification steps.
frontend/scripts/publish-live.sh: Publishes frontend Version 29 to the live environment after enforcing version checks and running preflight validation.
frontend/scripts/rebuild-draft-v29.sh: Rebuilds the Draft environment frontend using Version 29 settings without modifying backend or publishing to live.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures the app’s route tree and wraps the router with theme support and toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/admin/BookMediaM: Admin tool for uploading and removing book media files with progress tracking and type validation.
Protects admin pages by checking authentication and admin authorization, showing appropriate alerts or content.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button using Internet Identity with handling for loading states and errors.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Prompts authenticated users without profiles to enter their name and save their profile.
frontend/src/components/books/BookCard.t: Displays a book card with cover, title, pricing badges, availability indicators, and a link to view details.
frontend/src/components/books/CoverImage: Renders a book cover image using an uploaded blob if available, with fallback and error handling.
frontend/src/components/checkout/KycVeri: Handles KYC document input, validation, submission, and success state for checkout-restricted items.
frontend/src/components/checkout/SelfieC: Empty placeholder file with no implementation.
frontend/src/components/EmptyState.tsx: Reusable empty-state UI component displaying an icon, title, optional description, and action.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Shows footer with contact links, attribution, version info, and customer service chat dialog.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Renders the top navigation bar with branding, links, environment badge, balance, and cart indicator.
frontend/src/components/layout/Layout.ts: Wraps the app with header, footer, main content area, and profile setup dialog.
frontend/src/components/layout/PageLayou: Provides a configurable max‑width container for page layout with padding.
frontend/src/components/library/BookCont: Displays purchased book content and media with loading, error handling, previews, and download actions.
frontend/src/components/library/LibraryP: Downloads a purchased book's PDF with permission checks, error handling, and loading state.
frontend/src/components/support/Customer: Renders a customer support chat dialog allowing users to send messages, view threaded responses, and handle authentication state.
frontend/src/config/environment.ts: Determines app environment (Draft or Live) based on Vite env variables and exports the resolved value.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the user's identity, refreshing dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminRecovery.ts: Provides a mutation to trigger admin access recovery and maps backend errors to friendly messages.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuthz.ts: Handles fetching and saving the caller's user profile and checking admin status using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useBalance.ts: Fetches the user's token balance and provides mutations for minting tokens.
frontend/src/hooks/useBooks.ts: Provides queries and mutations for listing, retrieving, adding, updating, and uploading content for books.
frontend/src/hooks/useCart.ts: Manages cart retrieval, item updates, checkout, and derives cart totals with book info.
frontend/src/hooks/useCatalogTransfer.ts: Exposes mutations to export or import the full catalog and invalidates related caches on import.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity provider and hook for login, logout, and identity lifecycle management.
frontend/src/hooks/useKyc.ts: Provides a mutation hook to submit document-based KYC proof and invalidate cart data on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useLibrary.ts: Builds a user's library from delivered orders and fetches purchased book content or media.
frontend/src/hooks/useOrders.ts: Hooks for fetching a single order, the user's orders, or all orders depending on actor and identity availability.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty file reserved for organizing query hooks.
frontend/src/hooks/useResetStore.ts: Mutation hook to reset the backend store and invalidate all related caches with admin permission checks.
frontend/src/hooks/useSupportChat.ts: Hooks for sending support messages, retrieving user/admin chat data, and replying to messages with polling.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining theme variables, light/dark palettes, and base styling.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Utility merging Tailwind and className values using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point initializing React, the query client, identity provider, and global styles.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminCatalogPag: Provides admin tools to view, filter, add, edit, and manage books and their content/media within the catalog.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Defines the main admin dashboard with tabs for catalog, orders, minting, support, and settings.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminMintPage.t: Provides a form for admins to mint GLDT tokens to a specified principal using mutation hooks and form validation.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminOrdersPage: Displays all orders in a table with customer, items, totals, and dates, fetching data via hooks and rendering book titles per item.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminRecoveryPa: Handles admin access recovery via Internet Identity login, showing recovery steps, success state, and navigation after completion.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminSettingsPa: Enables store reset, catalog export, and catalog import with overwrite or merge modes, including file parsing and confirmation flows.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminSupportInb: Shows support message threads and lets admins reply to customers, grouping messages and supporting refresh and message responses.
frontend/src/pages/BookDetailsPage.tsx: Book details view allowing add‑to‑cart actions with loading, sold‑out, and error handling states.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Shopping cart page showing cart items, validations, removal actions, and checkout flow.
frontend/src/pages/CatalogPage.tsx: Catalog listing page that loads available books and supports title/author search filtering.
frontend/src/pages/CheckoutPage.tsx: Implements checkout flow including balance checks, KYC handling, and order creation with navigation to confirmation pages.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Displays the homepage hero section and featured books, fetching available books and linking to catalog and library.
frontend/src/pages/MyLibraryPage.tsx: Shows the user's purchased books with options to read or download content, handling loading and empty states.
frontend/src/pages/OrderConfirmationPage: Loads and displays detailed order information including items and total amount, with navigation to library or catalog.
frontend/src/pages/PurchaseConfirmationP: Shows a simple purchase success message and provides links to the library, order details, and catalog.
frontend/src/utils/catalogTransfer.ts: Validates, parses, and merges catalog export files, supporting overwrite and client-side merge modes for CatalogState objects.
frontend/src/utils/download.ts: Utility functions to download files or JSON data by creating blobs and triggering browser downloads.
frontend/src/utils/format.ts: Formatting helpers for token amounts, principal shortening, and converting bigint timestamps to readable dates.
frontend/src/utils/kyc.ts: Generates KYC identifiers and validates document numbers with basic length and presence checks.
Provides functions to detect KYC-restriction-related purchase errors and map them to a user-friendly message.
frontend/src/utils/orderId.ts: Generates a unique order ID using a timestamp and random number.
frontend/src/utils/principal.ts: Parses a principal string into a Principal object and throws an error for invalid formats.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Handles reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, including support for hash-based routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS with custom colors, typography, container settings, animations, and plugins.
frontend/VERSION: Version lock file defining the frontend version as 29.
project_state.json: Defines project state, existing features, versioning constraints, and a request to revert deployment to Version 29 only.
